title: Live From Quarantine (feat. Ed Larson)
description: Jay & Dan go live for the first time since the pandemic & recount some of their worst strip club memories. The guys family views on politics, race, and what its like being the Black Friend of a lot of white people. Jay explains his love/hate feelings on legendary TV host Jerry Springer. Comedian Ed Larson joined the show and discusses his new documentary, How America Killed My Mother.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
